summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2015, for the improvement of Palatine Avenue and 1st Avenue Northwest, each from North 60th Street to North 73rd Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 20420 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
